entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
